visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts treemap chart that visualizes the export data of Denmark in 2018. The chart should have a title 'Denmark Export 2018' and a subtitle 'Source: Harvard.edu'. The data should be fetched from 'https://www.highcharts.com/samples/data/denmark-export-2018.json'. The chart should use a custom color palette and have specific styling for labels and axes. The tooltip should display the name and value of each data point.

accessibility.description: Tree map detailing exported goods from Denmark in 2018. The services category is the largest, and makes up 39% of the total export. Transport services are the most exported. Chemicals are the second most exported category with 13%, then agriculture with 12%, and machinery with 10%. The other categories are textiles, electronics, metals, minerals, vehicles, stone, and other.

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration is designed to render a treemap chart that visualizes the export data of Denmark in 2018. The chart includes a title 'Denmark Export 2018' and a subtitle 'Source: Harvard.edu'. The data for the chart is fetched from an external JSON file, which contains the export percentages for various categories. The chart uses a custom color palette to differentiate between categories. The treemap layout is squarified, and it allows for drilling down into specific nodes. The data labels are styled with a specific font size and format, displaying the name and value of each data point. The tooltip, when hovered over a data point, displays the name and value formatted to two decimal places. The chart also includes accessibility features, such as a screen reader section and a detailed description of the chart's content.
